						Home					














 

































			MSc. in Computer Science		






Course Requirements




Bachelor of Science Degree in Computer Science or related disciplines, including Information Technology, Electronic Engineering and Information Systems from DeKUT, or from any other institution recognized by the University Senate, with at least Second-Class Honours (Upper Division) or a cumulative Grade Point Average (GPA) of 3.00 on a scale of 4.00 OR,


Bachelor of Science Degree in Computer Science or related disciplines,including Information Technology, Electronic Engineering and Information Systems, from DeKUT, or any other institution recognized by the University Senate, with Second Class Honours (Lower Division) or a cumulative Grade Point Average (GPA) of 2.00 on a scale of 4.00, and in addition, have relevant industry experience of at least two (2) years. The applicant should show evidence of research capability either through paper presentations or peer reviewed publications.
